item.description:
We will ride some fire roads and trails in Arcadia State Park. The ride is for those with off-road capable bikes.
We will encounter some hills, but short hills with relief/level out. Some are rocky, loose sand in spots, but definitely conquerable using the granny gears and a determined spirit.

If you welcome a challenge and don't mind some interval workouts along the way, then you will enjoy this ride. We will stay together and keep whatever pace is comfortable as a group. There are a few single trails we could try as well to extend the ride. The total mileage will be ~14 miles and take about 2 hours.

I'm still designing the ride, but will be finished by the time we meet.

These butterflies are often in the road and follow along side of the bike! Cool!

We will meet / park on Frosty Hollow Rd on the right side of the white Baptist Church on Rte. 165.  We'll ride Barber Rd, Brook Trail, Midway Trail to Plain Rd (Austin Farm Rd) and divert to Breakheart Pond then back down Frosty Hollow Rd.
item.name: Arcadia State Park: R.I. Trail Ride
